It's a type of game where you will lose your skills if you do not play for a couple of month, and takes time for you to slowly climb back up to the game skill you once had. It's a one of a kind game that will keep you excited even if you have not played it in months. Must try if you have not played this game.

E um jogo bacana, tem hacker porém poucos... o que mais me incomoda são os tóxicos que adoram acusar e xingar os demais, principalmente quando entram com grupinhos fechados. Nada que desencante o jogo.

Fun when people talk, you'll always run into toxic players but that is just a given with games like this. It is hard to figure out recoil at first but when you do it is interesting to use different guns. I usually only play casual but this game offers a couple competitive options too. I would recommend.
